positions.desc:
This text appears to be a collection of quotes and statements from Jacky Rosen, an American politician who served as the senior United States Senator from Nevada from 2019 to 2021. The topics covered in this text include:

* Social Security benefits
* Medicare benefits
* Veterans' issues
* Economic issues (e.g., affordable housing, lowering costs)
* Healthcare issues (e.g., protecting access to healthcare, reducing costs)

Some key points that can be taken away from this text are:

* Jacky Rosen is committed to protecting and strengthening Social Security benefits for future generations.
* She believes in improving Medicare by ensuring it continues to provide critical health coverage for older Americans without being weakened.
* Rosen prioritizes supporting veterans, including making military retirement pay tax-free.
* She aims to address economic issues such as affordable housing and lowering costs, particularly for Nevada families.
* As a senator, she is dedicated to fighting for better healthcare options and reducing costs.

Overall, the tone of this text suggests that Jacky Rosen is a strong advocate for protecting and improving social safety nets, supporting veterans, and addressing economic challenges affecting Nevada families.

sources.tweet: Whether it’s bringing a new VA hospital to Northern Nevada or expanding health care for veterans exposed to toxic burn pits, I’m working hard in the Senate to deliver for those who served our country. https://t.co/RC0qtDNk8u

Growing the middle class means investing in job training. I’ve fought to secure funding to support apprenticeship and technical skills programs – and I’ll continue to work with both parties to expand opportunities for all hardworking Nevadans.

High housing and rent costs are putting a major strain on hardworking Nevadans’ budgets. I’m fighting to bring relief by:

➡️ cracking down on price gouging by corporate investors
➡️ making more land available for affordable housing in Nevada
➡️ pushing for lower interest rates

I will always work to:
✅ Protect our seniors
✅ Defend abortion rights
✅ Expand access to health care

My opponent’s record shows he will:
❌ Gut Medicare & Social Security
❌ Ban abortion
❌ Repeal the Affordable Care Act

This is what’s at stake in the Nevada Senate race.

When I first ran for Senate, I promised to always do what’s right for Nevada.

That’s why I’ve fought to pass bipartisan laws that rebuild our infrastructure, protect our veterans & increase funding for border security.

I don’t work for anyone in Washington. I work for Nevada. https://t.co/V6qHRRgcRI

I took on the big drug companies to cap the cost of insulin at $35/month for seniors and give Medicare the power to negotiate prescription drug prices – and I won. I’ll never stop fighting to lower costs for hardworking Nevadans.

I’m proud to accept the endorsement of @NCPSSM. I’m the only candidate in this race that Nevada seniors can count on to protect their earned Social Security and Medicare benefits – I’ll always stand up to MAGA extremists’ attacks on these lifelines. https://t.co/ijXy2o05RU

On National First Responders Day, I want to thank those who protect and serve our communities. From securing funding for new equipment for Nevada firefighters to rebuilding the fire station in Storey County, I’ll always work to support our first responders.

Nevadans deserve to retire with dignity.

That’s why I’ll always fight to protect the hard-earned Social Security and Medicare benefits that so many older Nevadans rely on to make ends meet.

From increasing affordable housing opportunities, to protecting public lands, to  supporting veterans, I'm focused on continuing to deliver on the issues that matter most to Northern Nevadans.

Read more:
https://t.co/fGqeLSZIdS

@CortezMasto @KamalaHarris You’re exactly right, Catherine. Nevada’s elections are the closest in the country and we need every Nevadan to vote between now and November 5th so we can defend my Senate seat and keep making progress for our state.

Grateful to have the endorsement of @VoteVets for my reelection.

From securing the first-ever dedicated Veterans Business Outreach Center in Nevada to helping pass the bipartisan PACT Act to expand health care for toxic-exposed veterans, I’ll always support our nation’s heroes. https://t.co/uDD02NtV3e

I grew up in a working-class family and was the first in my family to graduate college.

Now, I’m fighting for Nevada every day in the Senate, and when I win this election I’ll keep delivering progress for hardworking families. https://t.co/Wfo6BJWlB2

I’m proud to be endorsed by the hardworking men and women of @IUBAC Mountain West. The bricklayers, craftworkers, and skilled tradespeople you represent across our state are building Nevada’s future, and I’ll always fight for you in the Senate. https://t.co/qhHxPnWtg4
From advanced skills-training and apprenticeship programs to community college or a four-year college degree, I’m fighting hard to make sure every higher education option is accessible for Nevadans.

Grateful to Mayor Nathan Robertson for his partnership over the years and his endorsement across party lines for my reelection.

I’m proud of the work we’ve done for rural communities like Ely, and I promise to keep fighting and delivering for all of Nevada in the Senate.

The work that Laborers’ Union Local 169 is doing to reach voters WILL make a difference in Washoe County and winning this critical battleground race. Together, we’re fighting for a future where all hardworking Nevadans can thrive – and our ground game is second to none. https://t.co/ffv8bTXaOp

The cost of buying a house or affording rent has gotten out of control. I’m taking action by standing up to corporate housing investors who jack up prices, working to cut taxes for first-time homebuyers, and pushing to open up federal land to build more affordable housing.

From capping insulin at $35 a month to cracking down on price gouging by Big Oil, I’m fighting to build an economy that lowers costs for the middle class and gives everyone the opportunity to succeed.

It’s important for workers to have the skills they need to succeed – even if they don’t go to college or decide to change careers. That’s why I’m working across the aisle to expand job training and apprenticeship programs that will prepare Nevadans to get good-paying jobs.

Sam Brown’s plan to eliminate the Dept. of Education would eliminate federal funding for Pell Grants, community college, career and technical education, and more.

I know how important these programs are for Nevada students, and I’ll always fight to protect them.

Los nevadenses merecen un retiro digno.

Es por eso que yo siempre lucharé por proteger el Seguro Social y Medicare, beneficios que nuestros adultos mayores se han ganado a base de trabajo duro y que les ayuda a solventar sus gastos mensuales. https://t.co/kK5HFMHfEO

We need to stop Big Oil CEOs from raising prices at the pump while raking in record profits at the expense of our hardworking families. I’m fighting every day to lower costs for Nevadans and hold corporate special interests accountable.

https://t.co/vubTWPx2oE

Social Security and Medicare allow our seniors to retire with dignity and peace of mind.

I’ve always worked to support Nevada’s seniors, and I’ll never stop pushing back against the extreme politicians in Washington who want to gut funding for these crucial programs. https://t.co/AsMjG17L2j

Rising prices are stretching families’ budgets to the breaking point – that’s why I’m working to build more affordable housing, stop price gouging at the gas pump, and lower costs for everyday essentials.

Sam Brown is running for Senate to please Donald Trump and force their Project 2025 agenda on Nevada.

I’m running for reelection to lower costs and keep fighting for our hardworking Nevada families.
I'll always fight for hardworking Nevada families like yours in the Senate. Sam Brown would sell you out to his billionaire donors the first chance he gets. https://t.co/0URFDQjDFo

I’ve secured millions of dollars in funding for police departments to address staffing shortages, improve training practices, and upgrade equipment – I’ll always support Nevada law enforcement officers in the Senate.

Job training and apprenticeships are crucial in preparing workers for the 21st-century economy. I’m securing funding to expand these programs and ensure Nevadans can thrive even if they don’t go to college or change their careers.

The Hoover Dam is a testament to the power of investing in infrastructure to grow the economy while creating jobs – and its construction began on this day in 1930.

I’ll continue fighting to secure funding for public projects that make Nevada’s future stronger.

I took on powerful drug companies to cap the cost of insulin at $35 a month and allow Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices – and I won.

I’ll never back down when it comes to fighting for lower costs for Nevadans. https://t.co/yZrSvreZ37

It was great to meet with hundreds of hardworking @Culinary226 members today alongside Las Vegas’ own @jimmykimmel. Culinary workers are fighting tirelessly to make sure that one job is enough for the people who make our 24/7 economy possible. https://t.co/9w1SWQXxbX

I’m forever grateful to our nation’s veterans and will always support them in the Senate.

Today, @CaptMarkKelly and I joined NV veterans to hear their concerns and talk about the work we’re doing to expand health care and economic opportunity for these heroes and their families. https://t.co/KLdF86xpDr

Thank you for having me @RSChamberNV! I’m working hard in the Senate to support our Northern Nevada business community, and the Reno + Sparks Chamber has always been an incredible partner. I’m pushing for policies that will cut bureaucratic red tape, expand opportunities for… https://t.co/jW9NHBcYfb https://t.co/6bEBvkFhGc

I took care of my parents and in-laws as they got older and had health problems, so I understand the challenges our seniors and caregivers face.

I’m fighting to lower costs and provide more support for NV’s seniors and caregivers because they deserve an advocate in the Senate.

I am committed to fighting for pro-worker policies in the Senate. 

One job should be enough for hardworking Nevadans to earn fair pay, secure good benefits, and retire with dignity.

Nevada housing should be affordable for Nevada families.

Watch my new ad on how I'm working to get it done: https://t.co/NBsleu21d5

Republicans are pummeling my campaign with attacks, and now Fox News is calling me "extreme" for supporting affordable health care and fighting to reduce gun violence.

I'll always do what's right for Nevada, but I can't win this race alone. Please donate:
https://t.co/ZlCPqVNaXl

Nevada families like Cindy’s deserve a Senator who’s fighting to give them some breathing room.

Our campaign is investing in talking directly to Filipino voters about the cost of living issues that matter most right now. https://t.co/fk26G1m0TW

Grateful to my good friend and colleague @ReverendWarnock for joining me on the campaign trail in Las Vegas yesterday! Together we will defend the Senate and keep working to lower costs and expand opportunity for hardworking families. https://t.co/GCmbV5thhB

Nowhere else I'd rather be after last night's debate than in the house of labor! Thank you to everyone who came out to talk about the work we're doing to deliver good paying-union jobs, lower costs, and protect Social Security and Medicare. https://t.co/lFRaj7AZMV
I’ll work with anyone from either party to support job training and boost our economy in Nevada. For Nevadans, I’m always going to work hard, because our state deserves it.

The outcome of Nevada’s Senate race will dictate our country’s path for decades to come.

I’m fighting for hardworking Nevada families. Together, we will build a better future for our children. Are you with me?
Bringing a new VA hospital to Reno is crucial for Northern Nevada veterans. I’m fighting in the Senate to ensure our veterans get the quality health care they have earned.

On my birthday this year, I’m filled with gratitude – for my family, health, and for the incredible team supporting my campaign.

My birthday wish is that you’ll join our growing team working to defend Nevada by signing up below. Thank you! 💜

A “roadmap for a better America.”

That’s what my MAGA opponent called an extreme plan that included phasing out Social Security and Medicare in just five years.

Make no mistake – I will always stand strong to protect Social Security and Medicare benefits for our seniors.

This #NationalPoliceWeek, I’m grateful for Nevada law enforcement officers who put their lives on the line every day to protect our communities. 

I’ll keep fighting in the Senate to make sure these brave officers have the resources they need to keep Nevadans safe.

I’ll always fight to protect and strengthen the Affordable Care Act – so that Nevadans like Margie will never have to worry about being denied coverage or discriminated against because of a pre-existing condition. https://t.co/ug59pbbgJw

Social Security and Medicare allow our seniors to retire with dignity, and I am committed to upholding and protecting those rights. 

Nevadans – believe the words Sam Brown has said. Voting for him is not worth the risk. https://t.co/pQ2tHzw1eA

I’ve helped secure funding for a new training center for Las Vegas law enforcement, mental health initiatives for Reno and Henderson police officers, and crucial technology for police departments across the state.

I'll always fight to deliver for Nevada law enforcement.

I was proud to help pass the PACT Act to support veterans exposed to toxic burn pits and expand health care for thousands of veterans in our state. It’s our responsibility to provide quality care to those who served, and I’m fighting for our veterans every day. https://t.co/QlOWJCGPRL
Hi, I’m Jacky, and I’m fighting for hardworking Nevada families. https://t.co/t7LadcWjmI https://t.co/BOW6vbPFjK

Small business owners like Magnolia are the backbone of our state. I’m working to cut red tape and expand opportunities for our entrepreneurs, so that Nevada small businesses can thrive. https://t.co/MHY85HN9Lf

Nevadans want to defend reproductive freedom, lower the cost of everyday essentials, and protect hard-earned Social Security benefits for our seniors.

Supporters like Gerrie know that I’m fighting hard every day in the Senate for the issues they care about. https://t.co/xyKK6a2NMJ

60 years ago, the Civil Rights Act delivered critical protections against legalized discrimination for marginalized communities.

We’ve come too far in the fight for full equality and justice to let MAGA extremists take us backwards.

I put myself through community college and worked as a banquet waitress on the weekends so I could pay my bills and make ends meet.

I’m fighting for hardworking Nevadans to get ahead because I understand the challenges they’re facing. https://t.co/9RpBzdo2g2

On the anniversary of Social Security becoming law, here’s a reminder that my opponent Sam Brown said he “admires” an extreme plan that would phase out the program in just 5 years.

I’ll always fight to protect the hard-earned benefits that Nevadans rely on for their retirement.

I’ve always fought to protect Social Security, and I’ve worked hard in the Senate to ensure older Nevadans can retire with dignity and afford the health care and medications they need. I’m grateful to have the support of @SSWorks. https://t.co/AyWBAluX4H

Driving Nevada’s unique economy forward is one of my priorities in the Senate. I’m fighting to continue bringing good-paying jobs to our state, cutting red tape for small businesses, and securing funding for infrastructure projects across Nevada.

It was wonderful to stop by the MLK Senior Center in North Las Vegas.

Whether it’s protecting Social Security and Medicare or capping the cost of insulin at $35/month for seniors, I’m fighting hard in the Senate to make sure that older Nevadans can retire with dignity. https://t.co/AwLRvwuErE

I'm proud to have the endorsement of the @LasVegasSun. In the Senate, I’ve been an independent voice for Nevada and worked across the aisle to deliver for hardworking Nevadans, and I look forward to continuing to fight for our state. https://t.co/GXMWyyoi7d

positions.desc: Chair of the Subcommittee on Tourism, Trade, and Export Promotion, Jacky Rosen has expressed her commitment to bolstering Nevada's booming clean energy economy, jumpstarting the state's future in solar and geothermal energy, and investing in projects that create jobs. She aims to protect public lands, promote clean energy, and support hardworking families while cutting red tape for small businesses.

sources.tweet: Had an awesome meeting with workers at Reno’s Patagonia warehouse touring their facility and sharing my commitment to protecting our public lands, promoting clean energy, and supporting hardworking families. https://t.co/KCUl7eV8Hu

Black entrepreneurs are a key part of Nevada’s economic growth, and I’m committed to cutting red tape and expanding entrepreneurship opportunities to help small businesses thrive.

It was great to join @WillMcCurdyII and small business owners for brunch this morning! https://t.co/gSDNfzLoY6

My extreme MAGA opponent Sam Brown says clean energy projects are “not for the benefit of Nevadans.” 

He couldn’t be more wrong.

I’m working to jumpstart Nevada’s future in areas like solar and geothermal so that we can create good-paying jobs & grow our clean energy economy.

From extreme heat and drought to deadly wildfires – the climate crisis impacts Nevadans on a daily basis.

I fought to ensure funding for clean energy projects, which are helping tackle climate change while creating thousands of good-paying jobs.

Sam Brown has a reckless plan to abolish the Department of Energy.

Nevada is a leader in solar energy production, and I’m making sure that we continue investing in clean energy projects that create jobs.

positions.desc: Jacky Rosen supports capping the cost of prescription drugs at $35/month for seniors and empowering Medicare to negotiate lower prices. She aims to make life more affordable for hardworking families, particularly those struggling with the high cost of insulin. Rosen also seeks to combat corporate price gouging in housing markets and promote pro-worker policies like paid family leave and equal pay for equal work.

sources.tweet: I’m supporting a bipartisan bill to combat fentanyl because we have to do more to address this crisis. Providing our law enforcement the equipment and resources they need is critical to keeping our communities in Nevada safe.

My extreme opponent is on the wrong side of lowering prescription drug costs.

I helped pass the new law capping the cost of insulin at $35 a month.

Sam Brown wants to repeal that law and take those savings away from thousands of Nevadans.

I took on powerful drug companies to cap the cost of insulin at $35 a month and allow Medicare to negotiate lower drug prices – and I won.

I’ll never back down when it comes to fighting for lower costs for Nevadans. https://t.co/yZrSvreZ37

Thanks to the historic law that I proudly helped pass two years ago, we’re lowering prescription drug costs for seniors, investing in clean energy and manufacturing, and creating thousands of good-paying jobs right here in Nevada.

Hardworking Nevadans are being squeezed by rising costs on their everyday needs. I took on the big drug companies to lower prescription drug costs and I’m pushing back against corporate investors who drive up housing costs to make sure that our hardworking families can succeed.

I took on the big drug companies to cap the cost of insulin at $35/month for seniors and give Medicare the power to negotiate prescription drug prices – and I won. I’ll never stop fighting to lower costs for hardworking Nevadans.

Nevadans are being squeezed by rising costs on everyday essentials. From capping the cost of insulin at $35/month to standing up to price gouging by corporate housing investors, I’m hard at work to make life more affordable for hardworking families.

Sam Brown supported an extreme plan to phase out Social Security and Medicare in just five years and called $35/month insulin a “big loss for the American people.”

He is a direct threat to the benefits that Nevada seniors rely on for their retirement. https://t.co/EKd3FwEYOT

Our workers deserve leaders who will advocate for their jobs, their families, and their rights. That is why I’m supporting initiatives to fund apprenticeship programs, fight for a higher federal minimum wage, and guarantee paid leave.

I’m fighting to build on our progress and cap the cost of insulin and bring down prescription drug prices for every single American — because no one should have to worry about how they’re going to pay for their life-saving medications.

No parent should have to worry about whether they can afford life-saving medication for their diabetic child.

I took on the big drug companies to cap the cost of insulin at $35/month because of families like Geoconda’s. Here’s her story: https://t.co/ESCvLHF2A4

We capped the cost of insulin at $35 a month for seniors and finally empowered Medicare to negotiate lower prescription drug prices – a historic investment that is bringing down costs for hardworking families.

My MAGA opponent called it “a big loss for the American people.”

I’m taking on corporate price gouging to provide relief for hardworking Nevada families in the checkout line and at the gas pump.

Nevadans are being squeezed by rising costs, and I’m working hard to make everyday essentials more affordable.

I took on the big drug companies to lower prescription drug costs, I’m holding corporate investors accountable for driving up housing costs, and I’m working across party lines to cut wasteful spending: https://t.co/ndGdiuXLfG

I’m proud of the work we’ve done to start lowering prescription drug prices, but there’s more to do to bring down costs for Nevadans.

I’m taking on price gouging by big grocery store chains and corporate landlords because we can’t let special interests keep ripping us off. https://t.co/hMFBu54vmp

Nevadans are being squeezed by rising costs. I’m taking on price gouging at the gas pump and standing up to corporate investors who jack up housing prices — because hardworking families need some breathing room. https://t.co/C4XMxyuBnu

positions.desc:
I'd be happy to help you summarize this text!

After reviewing the text, I can see that it's a collection of statements and positions held by a candidate ( likely Senator Catherine Cortez Masto) on various issues, including:

1. **Reproductive rights**: The candidate strongly supports abortion rights and will continue to fight for women's reproductive freedom in the Senate.
2. **Gun safety**: The candidate advocates for commonsense gun safety reforms, including banning bump stocks.
3. **Medicare and Social Security**: The candidate is committed to protecting these programs and ensuring their continued funding.
4. **Affordable healthcare**: The candidate supports expanding access to affordable healthcare, including lowering prescription drug costs.
5. **Climate change**: Although not explicitly stated, the candidate mentions tackling climate change as part of their platform.

Overall, this text presents a clear and consistent message from the candidate on various issues that are important to Nevadans.

sources.tweet: Not only was my opponent caught on tape admitting he will vote against Question 6, he was spreading dangerous misinformation about Nevada’s abortion protection ballot measure. Nevada women can’t trust Sam Brown to support reproductive freedom.

I first ran for office to make a difference for hardworking families. I’ve fought to lower housing and prescription drug costs, to pass common sense gun safety reform, and to protect abortion rights. Now, I’m running for reelection to continue delivering progress for Nevada. https://t.co/sLTXSTIooT

My support for reproductive freedom is unbreakable.

As a pro-choice leader in the Senate, I’ll continue to represent Nevadans and fight for women’s rights like lives depend on it – because they do.

On DACA’s 12th anniversary, it's never been more clear that we need a bipartisan solution for DACA recipients who are stuck in limbo.

Nevada’s Dreamers deserve long-term security and peace of mind. America is their home, and I’ll never stop fighting for permanent protection.

It’s been 64 years since the FDA approved the birth control pill, but anti-abortion extremists are still trying to limit women’s access to basic health care like contraception.

I will ALWAYS stand up for a woman’s right to make her own family planning decisions.

Unlike my extreme MAGA opponent Sam Brown, I stand for what Nevadans care about – from protecting reproductive rights to lowering the cost of prescription drugs.

Nevada voters know my record as an independent voice who puts NV first, and it’s why we’re going to win in November. https://t.co/M680csQFQe
RT @dscc: ✔️Jacky Rosen is fighting for Nevadans. https://t.co/0X2iRsW1VN

A national abortion ban would be devastating to women’s freedom in this country, especially in pro-choice states like Nevada.

In the Senate, you can ALWAYS count on me to fight for a woman’s right to make her own health care decisions.

Thank you to @lasvegasfill for having me on your podcast to talk about what’s at stake in this election! Abortion access is on the ballot in Nevada, and I’ll always fight for our women’s right to choose. https://t.co/PmntqHAxil

Just $5 will make a world of difference in our fight to defeat MAGA extremism, defend Nevada, and keep delivering for hardworking families. Can you make a donation today?

https://t.co/pd5G9SoNKw
My extreme opponent will lie to advance his political ambitions, but hardworking Nevadans know I’ve fought for our state – and always will. https://t.co/msKpXW14EN

This election is about choices.

And in November, Nevada voters are going to choose lower prescription drug prices, tax cuts and lower costs for working families, and reproductive freedom over far-right MAGA extremism. https://t.co/MlsJBIWvbN

We are 1️⃣ month out from Election Day!

There's so much on the line this November - from reproductive rights to housing affordability. So please, spread the word on this important Nevada Senate race. https://t.co/L3wu6BH1kd

“A moral atrocity.”

That’s what the anti-abortion group where my extreme opponent Sam Brown served as local president said about abortion.

He is out of touch and too extreme for Nevada.

I believe we must protect Nevada's kids and communities from gun violence. Our leaders can't accept these mass shootings as just a fact of life or be unwilling to consider bipartisan solutions.

Nevada families deserve a Senator who fights for commonsense gun safety measures.

Here are the facts:

➡️ Cook Political Report rates my race a Toss Up.
➡️ My GOP opponent is a direct threat to reproductive freedom, Social Security and Medicare, and education funding.
➡️ We need all hands on deck to win.

Share if you’re on board to defend Nevada in November🗳️

On the anniversary of Social Security becoming law, here’s a reminder that my opponent Sam Brown said he “admires” an extreme plan that would phase out the program in just 5 years.

I’ll always fight to protect the hard-earned benefits that Nevadans rely on for their retirement.

Nevada is a pro-choice state, and we’re going to keep it that way.

Thank you @alexismcgill and @PPact for joining me in defending reproductive freedom and keeping my opponent’s extreme anti-abortion agenda out of the Senate. https://t.co/55XA6XnOqF

My opponent is lying about his record to try to win an election, but we know the truth: he’s been trying to ban abortion for the past decade. 

Watch my latest ad, and visit https://t.co/xdhzjqpE9q to get the facts: https://t.co/FzmCiNHjrx

I just got an F rating from the NRA – and I’m proud.

While my MAGA opponent says he's “not willing to consider” any middle ground on gun safety reform, I’ll keep supporting common sense efforts to reduce gun violence.

I don't work for the gun lobby, I work for Nevada. https://t.co/7FPYvOblBE

The stakes of this election are high, and @barackobama said it best - we need to restore the reproductive freedoms women had for nearly 50 years before MAGA extremism overturned them.

I’m voting yes on Question 6 and will vote to codify Roe v. Wade protections into federal law. https://t.co/OKSDvfxlF1

I will always work to:
✅ Protect our seniors
✅ Defend abortion rights
✅ Expand access to health care

My opponent’s record shows he will:
❌ Gut Medicare & Social Security
❌ Ban abortion
❌ Repeal the Affordable Care Act

This is what’s at stake in the Nevada Senate race.

I’m fighting hard to restore the protections of Roe and pushing back against anti-abortion judges who want to ban abortion medications women have safely used for decades.

Abortion access is about women’s freedom – and freedom is always worth fighting for.

My extreme, anti-abortion opponent keeps finding new ways to show Nevada voters he can't be trusted when it comes to reproductive freedom. Unlike Sam Brown, I'll be voting YES on Question 6.

https://t.co/82SNy3RVV2

Loved welcoming the Reproductive Freedom Bus to Las Vegas today! I want to remind all Nevadans to vote FOR pro-choice leaders in November & vote YES on the Reproductive Freedom Amendment to protect abortion rights in our State Constitution. https://t.co/2i3uQNOA7r
Is Nevada a pro-choice state? Can you drop your ballot into a slot machine? Find out the answer to these questions and more as @JimmyKimmel and I play Nevada True or False! ✅❌ https://t.co/Xr5A08jEre

There’s no other way to put it – winning Nevada is *crucial* to holding the Senate. I’m ready to defend my battleground seat, defeat MAGA extremism, and keep delivering for our state. https://t.co/hHvh376I8n

Nevada’s AANHPI community is an integral part of our state’s economy and culture. Thank you, Rozita, for your support – you can count on me to fight for AANHPI Nevadans in the Senate. https://t.co/S3rqz4odxG

During National #WomensHealthWeek, we’re reminded of the disproportionate barriers that women face when it comes to health care access.

I’ll never stop fighting in the Senate to address the maternal health crisis and to restore women’s reproductive rights.

The stories I hear from Nevadans plant the seeds of the legislation I fight for in the Senate.

You can always count on me – not only to listen, but to take action and get things done on the issues that matter. https://t.co/OJxJq4UK07

@BarackObama Jacky Rosen here.

If you want to help me protect abortion rights in Nevada, support working families, and defeat MAGA extremism, please, join me in this fight by pitching in to my campaign today: https://t.co/nyCgJbdhWM

Election Day is 100 days away.

In 100 days, the future of reproductive freedom, Social Security and Medicare, and affordable housing will be on the ballot.

In 100 days, we’re going to defend Nevada – together. https://t.co/NhzomD9Y3S

Nevadans deserve a senator who puts our hardworking families first.

I’m working every day to lower costs, defend Medicare and Social Security, and protect reproductive freedom – and I’ll always stand up for Nevada families in the Senate.

I joined @emilyslist and @jessicamackler to discuss the threat that MAGA Republicans pose to abortion rights.

Reproductive freedom is on the ballot this year, and NV voters know that personal medical decisions should be made by a woman and her doctor – not extreme politicians. https://t.co/DGXUGrr80x

Had a wonderful time in Reno meeting with local Latino community leaders, elected officials, and small business owners.

Hearing your stories and answering your questions helps me understand how I can keep fighting for you in the Senate. https://t.co/09oSNn1fKH

Nevada families like Cindy’s deserve a Senator who’s fighting to give them some breathing room.

Our campaign is investing in talking directly to Filipino voters about the cost of living issues that matter most right now. https://t.co/fk26G1m0TW

It was a pleasure to join the members of @Culinary226. You had my back when I was a cocktail waitress at Caesars Palace, and now I have your back as your U.S. senator – you can count on me to fight for hardworking Nevadans and their families. https://t.co/Kr64O3g5Yx

In the two years since Roe was overturned, attacks on abortion rights from MAGA Republicans like my opponent have only intensified.

Nevadans can always count on me to fight for their reproductive freedom. https://t.co/pXRqZo262k

Sam Brown thinks he can hide his decade-long anti-abortion history – but Nevadans aren’t buying it.

Nevada is a pro-choice state, and I’m proud to vote YES on Question 6 to enshrine abortion rights into our state constitution.

Abortion rights are officially on the November ballot in Nevada – and it’s time to make our voices heard.

Her focus is on finding solutions that protect DACA and TPS recipients while addressing immigration concerns.

positions.desc: Jacky Rosen supports comprehensive immigration reform, including a path to citizenship for DACA and TPS recipients. She opposes policies that prioritize partisan politics over bipartisan solutions, citing the need for long-term security and peace of mind for Nevada's Dreamers. Rosen rejects MAGA extremism and Donald Trump's agenda, instead advocating for commonsense policies to fix the broken immigration system and expand opportunities for mixed-status families in Nevada.

positions.desc: Jacky Rosen supports commonsense gun safety measures and will continue to fight against gun violence to keep Nevada families and communities safe.
